Name: Buttery Chunks Lv.1
Description2$english: The multiple flavors of spices are enhanced by melting butter, adding to the deliciousness of this nine-flavor braised meat.

recipes.Name: Buttery Chunks
recipes.Des:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Hot melted butter unlocks the full spectrum of spices, elevating the already sumptuous nine-flavor braised meat to sublime depths of flavor.
recipes.Des$english:
Crafting yields products Lv.1 and Lv.2 at rates of 80% and 20%, respectively.
Hot melted butter unlocks the full spectrum of spices, elevating the already sumptuous nine-flavor braised meat to sublime depths of flavor.

NeedMaterial.Name: Premium Raw Meat
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Finely processed fresh meat, retaining only the essence of flavor through precise knife work, requiring only a skilled cook to transform it into a gourmet delicacy.

recipes.Name: Premium Raw Meat
recipes.Des:
Can process beast meat into Premium Raw Meat that can be used as a high-grade ingredient.
This process yields 7-8 products.
recipes.Des$english:
Can process beast meat into Premium Raw Meat that can be used as a high-grade ingredient.
This process yields 7-8 products.

NeedMaterial.Name: Raw Large Meat
NeedMaterial.Description: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: After processing​, it can be used for delicious cooking.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Meat obtained from wild creatures, the final taste depends entirely on the adventurer's cooking skills.

NeedMaterial.Name: Glowshroom
NeedMaterial.Description: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description$english: Used for cooking, making delicious dishes.
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Growing in damp, shadowy environments, it emits an eerie glow at night.

NeedMaterial.Name: Butter
NeedMaterial.Description2$english: Rich in nutrients but high in fat, so don't overconsume it.

NeedMaterial.Name: Fresh Milk
NeedMaterial.Description: A raw material that can be reprocessed by life professions.

NeedMaterial.Description2$english: The pure white nectar that fuels morning energy.

NeedMaterial.Name: Rock Salt
